(Usually Zardus is in control of the Island and Punch just has his job to 
waste time, with Zardus resting his broken hands for not paying the bookie, 
I'll take control I suppose)

Punch/


Punch's control was limited over the defenses, but he activated a dozen 
autoguns, all locking onto the intruder's signature.

Punch opened a comm. link with Chaos-------- (forgot).  "Leave Alliance 
territory or prepare to die."
